name: Swatzee!
description:
Extremely incomplete - No scoring system, janky physics. With some effort you could try to play Yahtzee with it. It may be incomplete garbage but it's MY incomplete garbage.

Move your mouse to move the fly. 

Hit a die from below to bounce it up and change its value. 

Hit a die from above to send it straight down. 

You are a fly trying to rig a game of Yahtzee! Keep the dice in the air to see what Yahtzee hand you can make before the time (not yet implemented lol) runs out!

Yahtzee Hands:

3 of a Kind, 4 of a Kind, Full House (2 of a Kind WITH 3 of a Kind)

Small Straight (4 in a row in ascending order),

Large Straight (5 in a row in ascending order),

Yahtzee (5 of a Kind)
